Okay, number one, the newbies here KNOW PERFECTLY WELL how to 
roleplay, so your complaint on that is void.  Number two, you have to 
EARN respect, and you're doing a piss-poor job thus far.  Number 
three, you need to shut up, start r-p'ing, and stop complaining about 
what others are doing, or I expect the council's going to take the 
same measures with you as they did with Tankor.

Who do you think you are, anyway, the king of the universe?

If your answer is anywhere near "yes" then get the fuck off this 
board!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> Booyah!  The Lurkerman is back, and I'm better than eeeveeerr.  Now 
that I've finally returned from my long hiatus, there's going to be 
BIG change around here.  Courtesty of yours truly, LurkerAbyss.  
First of all, I will be respected by EVERYONE.  Including the likes 
of lowly newbies to the authorities themselves, the council.  Second 
of all, I can't be bothered with pathetic newbies who don't know how 
to do this.  So, there will be cleaning up around  here as well.  And 
last, but not least, do NOT even THINK of whining at me, yelling at 
me, or insulting  me.  The Lurker era of NBWRPG begins right about 
NOW!
